## Vector4.axisNX() method

Creates a new Vector4 pointing in the negative direction of the X axis, i.e. vec4(-1, 0, 0, 0)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static axisNX(): Vector4;
```
**Returns:**

[Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md)

The new vector
